scenarios.name: init task document with required checklist
unauthorized code changes must fail verify gate

steps.cmd: python -c "from pathlib import Path; p=Path('meta/tasks/CURRENT.md'); t=p.read_text(encoding='utf-8'); p.write_text(t.replace('[x] Code changes allowed','[ ] Code changes allowed').replace('[X] Code changes allowed','[ ] Code changes allowed'), encoding='utf-8')"
